Class RecordParser<T extends SerializableData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tckb.data.parser.RecordParser<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomParser, DelimitedRecordParser

    public abstract class RecordParser<T extends SerializableData>
extends Object
    An abstract implementation of a record parser Created by tckb on 26/09/16.

    tckb
